subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dennis Rodman, who won five championships during a tumultuous 14-year N.B.A. career filled with as much controversy as glory, would like to add another title to his lengthy résumé: Hall of Famer.
snippet: Dennis Rodman, who won five championships during a tumultuous 14-year N.B.A. career filled with as much controversy as glory, would like to add another title to his lengthy résumé: Hall of Famer.
